translation.zh: 你好 我是斯宾塞医生

translation.en: But you can just call me Marcella.
I got your name through a friend
Absolutely. It comes with the territory.

translation.zh: 不要那么拘束 好吗？

translation.en: Take off your coat. Sit wherever you like.
translation.zh: 把大衣脱了吧 随便坐

translation.en: I'm glad you found the time to come and see me.
translation.zh: 很高兴你抽时间来找我

translation.en: that everything we talk about is completely confidential.
translation.zh: 我们所谈的一切都是完全保密的

translation.en: No one sees these notes but me.
translation.zh: 除了我 不会有人看到这些记录

translation.en: Well, it's not like I'm a movie star, or anything.
translation.zh: 也不是说我是个电影明星或什么的

translation.en: Why don't we just try something?
Maybe you can tell me what brought you here.
translation.zh: 也许你能告诉我你是为何而来

translation.en: You know, would that be easier for you?
translation.zh: 那样对你来说会更容易些吧？

translation.en: Well, it started the moment that, um, I realised that
translation.zh: 从那一刻开始 我意识到

translation.en: all the good things in my life
could never fill this void that's always been there.
translation.zh: 都无法填补这个一直存在的空白

translation.en: Best family anyone could hope for.
translation.zh: 所能期望到的最好的家人

translation.en: ZOE: My kids are the light of my life.
translation.zh: 我的孩子是我的生活之光

translation.en: A soldier holding a baby kangaroo... What?
translation.zh: 一个士兵抱着袋鼠宝宝…什么？

translation.en: Hold this thought. What else? Gimme somethin' else.
translation.zh:
沿着这个思路还有什么？
给我其他提示

translation.en: -(ZOE LAUGHING) -JASON: Up high. It's a torch!
It's a... Uh, Statue of Liberty!
Oh, my God! How did he get that?
ZOE: My momma's the kinda woman whose hug could turn a dark day bright.
translation.zh:
我妈妈是那种一个拥抱就能
把黑夜变为白昼的妈妈

translation.en: ZOE: My husband Jason is every woman's dream.
translation.zh: 我的丈夫杰森是每个女人的梦想

translation.en: He's my first love and my soul mate.
translation.zh: 他是我的初恋也是我的灵魂伴侣

translation.en: That feels so good. I love you.
Would you like a tracking number, so you can give them a call?
translation.zh: 你需要运单号 让你打电话过去吗？

-早上好 老板
-早上好 肖恩

translation.en: You look absolutely dazzling, as usual.
translation.zh: 像往常一样 你看起来耀眼极了

translation.en: Can you tell Brina to come see me when she gets in? Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 布琳娜到时 可以叫她来找我吗？

translation.en: Brina is always here. Brina lives here.
translation.zh: 布琳娜一直都在 布琳娜住在这里

translation.en: -Hmm. Maybe I should charge you for rent. -Maybe you should start payin' me more.
translation.zh:
-也许我应该找你收房租
-也许你应该付我更多工资

translation.en: -Maybe I should. -Maybe you can't afford it.
translation.zh:
-也许我该如此
-也许你付不起
也许无论怎样我也会做

translation.en: -Maybe I won't let you. -Hey! I'm the boss.
translation.zh:
-也许我不会让你做
-嘿！我才是老板

translation.en: And I'm here to keep you being the boss.
You try to pay me more, and I'll quit.
translation.zh: 你要付我多点 不然我就辞职
好吧 把我都搞胡涂了

translation.en: He doesn't let people take his photo.
I was gonna say "croissant," but thanks for the info.
translation.zh:
我想说的是“牛角面包”
但谢谢你的汇报

translation.en: So, wait, this guy still doesn't have a rep?
translation.zh: 等等 这个人还没有代理？

translation.en: Well, he's all about the art.

translation.zh: “昆顿卡诺萨 人民艺术家”

translation.en: You know, every piece just grabs you, you know, in the gut.
translation.zh: 每一幅作品都能抓住你的心
我们可以特许他的作品

translation.en: and introduce him to a whole new world of revenue.
translation.zh: 带他进入吸金的新世界

translation.en: Do your thing, girl. Go get that revenue.
Ooh! And once that happens, we need to reinstate mani-pedi Fridays.
translation.zh:
一旦事成
我们需要恢复每周五的美甲

translation.en: Like it? I... I love it. Yeah.

translation.zh: 昆顿卡诺萨难以置信的才华

translation.en: Do you know anything about art?

translation.zh: 昆顿卡诺萨是个天才 好吧？

translation.en: He's one of the greatest artists of our time.
translation.zh:
他是我们这个时代
最伟大的艺术家之一

translation.en: If you can't see that, I don't know what you're doing here.
translation.zh:
如果你看不到这点
我不知道你在这里干什么
不 不会吧 你？你…

translation.en: I feel like such a fool.
No, no. Please don't. Well, just a little bit.
translation.zh: 不 没有 好吧 有那么一点

translation.en: Oh, you don't? Um, I was saying, it, uh...
It's a pleasure to meet you.
It's an honour to meet you, Quinton.
translation.zh: 很荣幸认识你 昆顿

translation.en: Yeah. I didn't catch your name, Miss...
translation.zh: 我还不知道你的名字呢
上帝啊 总是这样 对吧？

translation.en: The good ones, they're always taken.
translation.zh: 好的 都总被挑走了

translation.en: Uh, I don't know if this is the right place or time
Well, if it's the only way to keep you next to me...
translation.zh: 如果这是唯一可以在你身边的机会

translation.en: You were gonna talk about business.
Oh, yeah, yeah. Well, I have a company
translation.zh: 哦 是的 我有一个公司

translation.en: and, uh, we represent contemporary artists.
Okay, can you tell me about it?
We would license your work to the highest bidder,
translation.zh:
我们会把你的作品
授权给出价最高的人

translation.en: you know, it could be a classy advertising campaign,
translation.zh: 这可能是一个很好的广告宣传活动

translation.en: or, um, you know, inspiration for a clothing line.
translation.zh: 或是服装系列的灵感来源

translation.en: I mean, you are an incredible artist, solely,
translation.zh: 你是位了不起的艺术家 独一无二的

translation.en: but we would expand on that artistry into a brand.
translation.zh: 我们可以把这扩展为一个品牌

translation.en: Can you explain that to me again, please?
Oh, I'm sorry. Spanish... Am I talking too fast?
translation.zh:
抱歉 西班牙语…
我说的太快了吗？

translation.en: I just love to watch the way your lips move.
translation.zh: 我只是喜欢看你嘴唇的动作

translation.en: Um, so, you know, if you're interested,
translation.zh: 哦 如果你感兴趣的话

translation.en: uh, my office could contact you and set up a meeting.
translation.zh: 我公司可以联系你 并进行会议

translation.en: Okay, um... I don't think... Uh, you know what?
translation.zh: 好的 呃 我不认为 你知道吗？

translation.en: Honestly, I don't like to be so formal. Besides, you already know I'm interested.
translation.zh:
老实说我不喜欢这样正式
而且你知道我已经有兴趣了

translation.en: So let's do something. Monday morning. 9:00. Come to my studio.
translation.zh:
这样吧
周一早上九点来我的工作室
佐伊 可以叫你佐伊吗？

translation.en: Meeting Quinton Canosa just made me realise
translation.zh: 和昆顿卡诺萨的见面让我意识到

translation.en: how much I missed excitement in my life.
translation.zh: 我的生活里有多么缺乏兴奋

translation.en: And did you act out on that feeling?
translation.zh: 你有将那种感情表现出来吗？

translation.en: I tried to relive it with Jason.
Hey, handsome. Are you on your way?
translation.zh: 嘿 帅哥 在路上了吗？

translation.en: Oh, sweetie. This is gonna be one of those long nights.
translation.zh:
哦 亲爱的
这将是一个漫长的夜晚

translation.en: I gotta finish the plans for the Civic Centre by the weekend
translation.zh: 我得在周末前把市政中心的计划弄完

translation.en: We didn't have any plans tonight, did we?
translation.zh: 我们今晚没有什么安排 对吧？
那快点回来吧 好吗？

translation.en: But don't wait up, all right?
And kiss the kids for me.

translation.zh: 好的 我会的 爱你

translation.en: Um, I'm going to the store. Do you need anything?
translation.zh: 我要去商店 你要什么吗？

translation.en: Hmm. You are definitely going to be the best-dressed lady
(CHUCKLING) Well, I got dressed up for Jason.
translation.zh: 我得为了杰森好好打扮自己

translation.en: I'll see you in a minute.
NINA: Hey, you still at the store?
Um, I'm in the parking lot. I'm just leaving.
translation.zh: 我在停车场 准备走了

translation.en: Oh, I don't want you to have to go back in.
You're probably ready to hop into bed.
translation.zh: 你也许已经准备好上床睡觉了

translation.en: Is that music I hear in the parking lot?
translation.zh: 那是我在停车场听到的音乐吗？

translation.en: Oh, someone's just blasting their stereo. Um...
I don't mind. I'm already here.
translation.zh: 没事 已经在这儿了

translation.en: I could sure use some ice cream. I mean, uh...
That cookie dough flavour, if they have it.
translation.zh: 曲奇面粉 如果他们有的话

translation.en: Cookie dough ice cream, comin' right up.
translation.zh: 曲奇面团冰淇淋 马上就来

translation.en: I couldn't wait to make it up to you
translation.zh: 等不及要为晚餐的失约

translation.en: ZOE: Well, I can think of something.
ZOE: I love you. JASON: I love you, too.
QUINTON: You look so beautiful when you sleep.
translation.zh: 你睡着的时候看起来美极了

translation.en: Lucky me. My own personal wake up call.
translation.zh: 多幸运啊 我的独家个人闹钟

translation.en: You must be hungry. Come on. Let me make you some breakfast.
translation.zh: 你一定饿了 来 我来做早餐

translation.en: Well, let me go see. I'm so excited.
translation.zh: 我去看看 太激动了

translation.en: Well, I have to get the kids to...
I'll take 'em today. You just enjoy your breakfast.
translation.zh: 今天我去 你好好吃早餐就行

translation.en: -Good morning, Mom. You got up late. -(CHUCKLING) Mmm. Good morning, big boy.
translation.zh:
-早 妈妈 你起晚了
-早上好啊

translation.en: JASON: Okay, guys. Ready for school?
translation.zh: 小伙子们 准备好去学校了吗？

translation.en: ZOE: I was watching the love of my life take our beautiful children to school
translation.zh:
我看着我的最爱带着我的
可爱孩子们去上学

translation.en: and all I could think about was what I was still missing.
translation.zh: 我能想到的就是 我还缺什么呢
很奇怪 如此爱一个人

translation.en: to love someone so much, and still have it never be enough.
translation.zh: 很奇怪 如此爱一个人 但仍旧觉得不满足

translation.en: So, did you feel this way in other relationships before you got married?
translation.zh:
那么你在结婚之前
和其他人一起时 有这样的感觉吗？

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't know. I never had any.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我从没有过其他人

translation.en: Jason is the first person you'd ever been with, until recently?
translation.zh: 杰森是你的第一个 一直到最近？

translation.en: We had our first child a few years later.
translation.zh: 几年之后有了第一个孩子
接下来的事你都知道了

translation.en: Do you feel that changed your relationship with Jason?
translation.zh: 你觉得那改变了你和杰森的关系吗？

translation.en: It's just that I, you know, always needed something more in my life.
translation.zh: 只是 我在生活中总觉得要更多

translation.en: Well, you know, Zoe, with kids, intimacy changes.
translation.zh: 佐伊 有了孩子 亲密感会改变

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta make time for it.
Look, we have sex two or three times a day sometimes.
translation.zh: 我们有时一天做两三次爱

translation.en: And if I keep telling him that I want more,
translation.zh: 如果我一直告诉他我还想要

translation.en: he's gonna think I'm a complete freak.
translation.zh: 他一定会认为我是个变态

translation.en: From everything you say, it sounds like you and Jason
translation.zh: 据你所说 听起来你和杰森

translation.en: I should've talked to him more.
I should've done a lot of things but, instead...
translation.zh: 我本应该做很多事情的 但…

translation.en: I took my first step down a terrible path.
translation.zh: 我踏上了一条很危险的路

translation.en: -So, you live here, too, huh? -Oh, yeah.

translation.zh: 实际上 我做什么都是在这儿

translation.en: Uh, my husband would love your work.
translation.zh: 我老公一定超喜欢你的工作

translation.en: Well, he's obviously a man of taste.
translation.zh: 显然他是一个有品位的人

translation.en: Here's what we do at Zoe & Company.
translation.zh: 这是我们在佐伊和公司所做的

translation.en: Oh, let me guess. You add me to your client roster,
translation.zh:
让我猜猜看
你把我加到你的客户名单里

translation.en: and then you license my work to the highest bidder,
translation.zh: 然后把我的作品出给竞价最高的

translation.en: and then my stuff ends up on every calendar, every coffee mug, lunch box...
translation.zh:
然后我的作品出现在日历、
咖啡马克杯、午餐盒等上面

translation.en: I don't know. Just pretty much everywhere.
translation.zh: 不知道 差不多是到处都是

translation.en: You think I'm that crass? Wow. (SCOFFS)

translation.zh: 好吧 也许咖啡马克杯上会有

translation.en: So, I believe you have a contract for me to review?
translation.zh: 我想你有一份合同要给我看？

translation.en: You can go over that with your attorney
translation.zh: 你可以和你的律师一起过目

translation.en: and do all your research about us, or whatever...
I have done all the research I need.
translation.zh: 我已经做了需要做的调查了

translation.en: The one and only Quinton Canosa is my new client?
translation.zh: 唯一的昆顿卡诺萨是我的新客户了？

translation.en: You, uh... You're not the first person to ask me
to do the whole commercial art thing.
You wanna know why I chose you?
translation.zh: 想知道为什么选择你吗？

translation.en: I wanna ask you for something in return.

translation.zh: 我真是受宠若惊 但…

translation.en: Let me think about that one.
Okay, so I will let my office formalise our deal
translation.zh: 好的 我会叫办公室把协议弄好

translation.en: I want to paint you and put you over my bed.
translation.zh:
我想画下你
把你放在我的床上

translation.en: So that when you're not here,
I can satisfy myself with the mere thought of you.
translation.zh: 一想到你 我就满足了
很高兴你的称赞 但…

translation.en: I really am. But I can't. I'm married.
translation.zh:
我真的很高兴
但我不可以 我结婚了

translation.en: So... How do you open this damn door? (MURMURING SOOTHINGLY)
Relax. I know you want it.
translation.zh: 放松 我知道你也想要的

translation.en: I can feel it. I know you want it.
translation.zh: 我能感觉到 我知道你想要
没有什么比这更正确的了
哦 天啊 太爽了！

translation.en: There's a guy named Balthazar Crayne on 2.
translation.zh: 有个叫巴尔塔扎尔克雷恩二号的

translation.en: This guy doesn't sound like he's used to being kept waiting.
translation.zh: 这家伙不像是习惯等人的那种
噢 我有这个 老板？

translation.en: Can you hang on a sec? I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 可以等会儿吗？一会儿打给你

translation.en: Alfred Conteh is freaking over the coffee mugs.
translation.zh: 艾尔弗雷孔戴为咖啡杯而发狂

translation.en: Yeah, I can't deal with him right now.
So I'll be home and just, um, forward me anything that's urgent.
translation.zh:
我要回家了
有急事的话给我电话
巴尔萨扎克雷恩算是急事吗？

translation.en: His office just called a third time.
translation.zh: 他的办公室刚刚打了第三次电话

translation.en: He could change our lives. Take this place to the next level.
translation.zh:
他可以改变我们的生活
把这个地方提升一个层次

translation.en: Well, how do you know this guy?
is my sister's best friend from high school.
translation.zh: 是我姐姐高中时的好朋友

translation.en: She introduced me to a guy who works for his accountant.
translation.zh: 她把我介绍给一个他的会计

translation.en: One drink led to another, I sent him our website,
translation.zh:
一杯接一杯
我给他发了我们的网站

translation.en: and now the Balthazar Crayne is calling you.
translation.zh:
现在是巴尔扎克雷恩
正在打电话给你

translation.en: No. "Nice work" is when I introduce you to an up-and-coming artist.
translation.zh:
不“干得好”要等到
我给你介绍这位后起之秀艺术家

translation.en: This is "Brina, you are the most freaking amazing person
translation.zh: 会是“布琳娜 你是世界上

translation.en: So you go back in your office and you call him.
translation.zh: 那你回办公室然后打给他

translation.en: Just tell him that I'll take him to dinner tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 告诉他我明晚会请他吃饭

translation.en: And, um, we'll discuss it then. And just make it someplace expensive.
translation.zh:
我们到时再聊
记得找个贵点的地方

translation.en: BRINA: I pull this off and you owe me something big.
translation.zh:
我搞定了这个
你就欠我一个大人情

translation.en: I thought you couldn't come to the game because you were working?
translation.zh:
我想你不会来看比赛
是因为你要工作？

translation.en: We saw your car in the driveway. You okay?
translation.zh:
我们在车道上看到你的车
你还好吧？

translation.en: Look, I wasn't feeling well, sweetie. So I came home early, okay?
translation.zh:
听着我感觉不舒服 亲爱的
所以我提早回家 好吗？

translation.en: But I promise I will be there at the next one.
translation.zh: 但我保证下一次我会去的
好吗 亲爱的？我保证

translation.en: Okay. You have to come. It's the last game of the season.
translation.zh:
好的 你一定要来哦
这是本赛季的最后一场比赛

translation.en: You have my word. Got it?
Uh, why don't you let Grandma go get you a snack
translation.zh: 为什么不让外婆给你做点吃的

translation.en: You know, maybe it was the kids' flu from last week.
translation.zh: 也许是上周孩子们的流感

translation.en: I don't know. I just took some medicine.
translation.zh: 不知道 我吃了点药了

translation.en: -Okay. -I'll be down there in a sec.
No, no, no. Rest. I'll get him started on homework
translation.zh: 不 休息 我会叫他做作业的
把凯拉从钢琴课上接回来

translation.en: Here is the restaurant address and directions.
Balthazar will meet you there tonight at 7:00 sharp.
translation.zh: 巴尔萨扎今晚七点整在那里见你

translation.en: I had to sell one of my kidneys to get a reservation, so don't be late.
translation.zh:
我不得不卖掉一个肾才订到的
所以不要迟到了

translation.en: Shane, can you get me a courier?
translation.zh: 肖恩能帮我找个快递员吗？

translation.en: Never mind. I'll deal with it.
Hey. Are you looking for Quinton?
Is there something you wanna leave for him?
translation.zh: 有什么要带话给他的吗？

translation.en: You can leave it with me, Zoe.
translation.zh: 可以留言给我的 佐伊

translation.en: No. How do you know my name?
translation.zh: 不是 你怎么会知道我的名字？

translation.en: Quinton told me all about you.

translation.zh: 一点小建议 小心点
昆顿是个艺术家 他很…

translation.en: What... What's goin' on? Are you...
-What do you mean? -I can't. I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-我做不到 抱歉

translation.en: It's not that I don't want to. Some part of me...
translation.zh:
不是我想那样的
我身体里的一部分…

translation.en: I'd be lying if I said that.
translation.zh: 如果我那样说 就是我在撒谎

translation.en: (STAMMERING) But my family, my kids, my husband...
translation.zh:
但我的家庭我的孩子、
我的丈夫…

translation.en: I never want to force you into something you don't want to do.
translation.zh: 我从没想过要逼你做你不想做的事

translation.en: "Thank you?" (CHUCKLING) Just like that, thank you? All right.
translation.zh:
“谢谢你？”
就这谢谢你？好吧

translation.en: Mmm-mmm-mmm. No, no, no. Stop. -Please. I can't. -(GROANING)
translation.zh: 不 求你了 我不可以

translation.en: I wanna show you something special.
After that, you can go home if you want to.
translation.zh: 之后如果你想的话 你可以回家
好吧 就一小时保证

translation.en: I want your first look to be perfect. Hmm?
translation.zh: 我想你的第一眼是完美的 好吗？

translation.en: QUINTON: I started it when I was 11.
And I've never shown this to anyone before.
Well, is, um, that you and your family?
When I was nine years old, my mom...
translation.zh: 我九岁的时候 我的妈妈…

translation.en: She ran off with another man.

translation.zh: 我们再也没有看到过她

translation.en: I know things happen in a marriage,
but for a mother to just leave her child and never look back, that's...
translation.zh:
但一个母亲就这样离开她的孩子
再也不回来这…

translation.en: I can never get over that.
I know this is all wrong.
I know I'm not supposed to...
To be with another man's wife, but...
translation.zh: 和某人的妻子在一起 但…

translation.en: ZOE: Balthazar! Mr Crayne! Wait! Wait, wait, wait! (PANTING)
translation.zh: 巴尔萨扎！克雷恩先生！等等！

translation.en: I'm Zoe. I am so sorry.
translation.zh: 我是佐伊 我十分抱歉

translation.en: if you were furious with me for being so rude
translation.zh: 如果你很生气我这么没礼貌

translation.en: and didn't wanna have anything to do with me,
But my daughter Kayla was sick tonight and I took her to the doctor,
translation.zh:
但我的女儿凯拉今晚生病了
我带她去看了医生

translation.en: and I just lost track of time.
I'm on a red-eye to Paris.
translation.zh: 我要搭红眼班机去巴黎

应该打电话给我办公室
重新安排时间

translation.en: I hope your daughter feels better.
I totally lost track of time when I was with Quinton.
translation.zh:
和昆顿在一起
我完全忘记了时间

translation.en: I keep using my kid as an excuse.
I said my daughter was sick.
God, you don't wanna put that out in the universe.
This is making me crazy. I'm... I'm so messed up.
translation.zh: 这让我抓狂 我过得一团糟

translation.en: I know, I know that it's ruining my life. It's terrible. But I keep going back.
translation.zh: 我知道正在摧毁我的生活 很害怕 但我节节后退

translation.en: So how long have you been meeting him now?
translation.zh: 你现在和他一起多久了？
每天 如果我可以的话

translation.en: Oh. Well, thank you so much,
uh, but I, uh... I better hurry.
If I hurry, I can actually get the kids to bed.
translation.zh:
如果我快点
我可以带孩子们睡觉

translation.en: Let's make some time for next week.
translation.zh: 我们下周再约个时间吧

translation.en: Yeah, it's just that, you know...
I have to see if I have, well, the time.
translation.zh: 我得看看我是否有时间

translation.en: You know, with the kids and work and Jason...
translation.zh: 有小孩、有工作、还有杰森

translation.en: See, coming here is just one more thing that I have to hide.
translation.zh: 来这里是我另一件要隐瞒的事情

translation.en: ZOE: When can I see it?
You don't like waiting for anything, do you?
I thought that's what you liked about me.
translation.zh: 我以为这就是你喜欢我的地方

translation.en: There you go. Just hold it. There. Okay...
You're a model. Models keep still. Okay?
translation.zh:
你是模特
模特要保持不动的 知道吗？

translation.en: Some women I used to know.
Well, I, um... I paint what I feel.
I have no right to be.
-Zoe, come on. -It's so funny. It's so funny.
What the hell am I doing here?
What are you doing here? I mean...
translation.zh:
你在这里干什么？
我的意思是…

translation.en: I think we both know the answer to that one.
translation.zh: 我想我们都知道这个问题的答案

-是的 我们
-我们知道答案？

translation.en: -Yeah, we do. -Are you sure I'm not just
translation.zh:
-是的 我们
-你确定我不是

translation.en: another one of your women that you've lured into your lair?
translation.zh: 又一个被你引诱到你巢穴的女人？

translation.en: What's wrong with you? Zoe, come on.
They're just paintings from a long time ago, I told you.
translation.zh:
跟你说过了
它们只是很久以前的画了

translation.en: You belong here, Zoe. You know that.
translation.zh: 你是属于这里的 佐伊 你知道的

translation.en: 'Cause nobody... Nobody has ever made me feel this way.
translation.zh: 因为没有人曾让我有这样的感觉

translation.en: Talk this way. Seen my soul.
translation.zh: 这样说吧 看到了我的灵魂

translation.en: JASON: Okay, trap it. First, trap it. Don't plant your foot too early.
translation.zh:
抓住它！首先 抓住它
脚不要太早落地

translation.en: JASON: Put it right next to the ball, look.
translation.zh: 像这样放在球边 看

嘿 亲爱的！
怎么样？

translation.en: NINA: Oh, you should have seen him!
-Saved the day. -Oh, wow! Our star player!
translation.zh:
-化险为夷
-哇喔！我们的小明星！

translation.en: -ZOE: Um... -Hey, hey, hey, hey! Peter, I'm sorry. I had to work.
translation.zh:
-嘿！
-皮特 我很抱歉 我要工作

translation.en: Can I get blue hair, too? Please?
translation.zh: 我也可以有蓝头发吗？拜托？

translation.en: Come on, stop yanking on your momma.
ZOE: I was gonna tell him.
It would destroy my family, my life.
translation.zh: 这会毁了我的家庭、我的生活
我病了 真的生病了

translation.en: Zoe, this is an obvious sign of addiction here.
translation.zh: 佐伊 这是上瘾的明显迹象

translation.en: No, you can't smoke it, shoot it, or snort it.
translation.zh: 不是的你抽不了、开不了、也吸不了

translation.en: But make no mistake, sex can be a drug, too.
translation.zh: 但毫无疑问 性也可能是一种毒品

translation.en: It's as powerful as any narcotic.
translation.zh: 它和任何麻醉药一样强大
不会吧 这也太疯狂了

translation.en: it's not as common as alcoholism or drugs.
translation.zh: 它不像酗酒或吸毒那么常见

translation.en: But it is a very real problem
translation.zh: 但这是一个非常现实的问题

translation.en: that thousands of people are battling each day.
translation.zh: 成千上万的人每天都深受其害

translation.en: Your first time with a lover outside of your marriage
translation.zh: 你和伴侣外的情人第一次在一起

translation.en: is like your first hit of heroin.
Okay. Well, then what do I do?
translation.zh: 好吧 那我该怎么办？

translation.en: Because I come here to see you, and we talk and we talk, and we talk.
translation.zh: 我来这里见你了 我们谈了

translation.en: I need help! What's the plan?
translation.zh: 我需要帮助！计划是怎样的？

translation.en: Now, you said that you tried talking to Jason before.
translation.zh: 你说你曾尝试和杰森坦白

translation.en: I think that you should suggest to him couples counselling.
translation.zh: 我认为你应该向他建议夫妻咨询

translation.en: Then he'll know there's a real problem in your marriage.
translation.zh:
那他就会知道你们的婚姻中
真的有问题

translation.en: JASON: I didn't know you got a new cell phone.
translation.zh: 我不知道你有新手机了

translation.en: Crayne, Balthazar Crayne, you know, that investor guy.
translation.zh:
克雷恩 巴尔萨扎克雷恩
你知道的那个投资者

translation.en: One of his companies sells them and they gave them out as promos.
translation.zh: 他的一家公司把这些当促销品卖掉了

translation.en: Oh. Here, I'll take it. That's okay.
I think that's your new millionaire boyfriend calling.
translation.zh:
我想那是你的新百万富翁男朋友
打来的电话

translation.en: Oh, please. Yeah. That's all I need in my life.
translation.zh:
拜托 是的
那就是我一生所追求的

translation.en: Another man. You are all the man that I need.
translation.zh:
另一个男人
你就是我需要的那个人

translation.en: there is a problem that we should talk about.
translation.zh: 有个问题我们得谈一谈

translation.en: Maybe you and I should talk to somebody.
translation.zh: 也许你和我应该找人谈谈

translation.en: Uh, a professional, about our... Our sex life.
translation.zh: 一个专家 关于我们性生活的

translation.en: What's wrong... What's wrong with our sex life?
translation.zh:
什么问题
我们的性生活有什么问题？

translation.en: Wait, hold on. What do you mean by "a professional"?
translation.zh:
等等
你说的“专家”是什么意思？

translation.en: I'm not gonna talk to a shrink about anything.
translation.zh: 我不会和心理医生谈任何事情的
更别说是我们的私事了

translation.en: Half of those people are crooks.
translation.zh: 这些人中有一半是骗子

translation.en: No, no. Ridiculous is the money they spend
translation.zh: 不 荒谬的是他们把钱

translation.en: on some fake doctor to listen to their problems.
translation.zh: 花在听他们问题的假医生身上

translation.en: Wow. I didn't know you hated an entire profession.
translation.zh: 哇 我不知道你讨厌整个职业

translation.en: we have always talked about everything, right?
translation.zh: 我们一直无话不谈对吧？

translation.en: Why would we need to bring somebody in, a total stranger,
translation.zh:
为什么要把事情说给别人听呢？
一个完全的陌生人

translation.en: and have them get in between us? Hmm?
translation.zh: 让他掺和到我们中间来呢？

translation.en: Jason, why aren't you listening to me? I mean, I think that... You know, maybe...
translation.zh:
杰森 为什么不听我的？
我的意思是 我想也许…

translation.en: -Listen to you, listen to you. -... it would be a good...
You're exhausted. You work too hard.
translation.zh: 你太累了 你工作太辛苦了

translation.en: Why don't we go to that French place on Saturday?
translation.zh: 我们周六去那个法国餐馆如何？

translation.en: The one you like. With the candles.
translation.zh: 你喜欢的那家 有蜡烛的

translation.en: I need to take a walk.
Okay, that's a good idea. Get some fresh air.
translation.zh: 好吧 去呼吸下新鲜空气

translation.en: Quinton, that was great. I needed that.
translation.zh: 昆顿 太厉害了 我要那样

translation.en: Actually, I'm not okay. I'm not okay. I, uh...
translation.zh: 实际上 我不好 我不好 我…

translation.en: -I think we need to talk. -Talk about what?
About us. About the whole thing.
translation.zh: 关于我们 关于所有的

translation.en: I mean, it has been great and everything, but...
Leave your husband and be with me.
-You can't? Why the hell not? -I can't.
translation.zh:
-你不能？究竟为什么不可以？
-我做不到

translation.en: -I can't leave Jason. -Tell me, tell me why not.
translation.zh:
-我不能离开杰森
-跟我说为什么不可以

translation.en: Yeah, and that's why you're here with me every chance you get?
translation.zh:
那是为什么你一有机会就来这
和我一起鬼混的原因吗？

translation.en: Oh, Quinton, come on, you knew that I was married when we met.
translation.zh:
昆顿 别这样 我们遇见时
你就知道我已经结婚了

translation.en: I didn't expect anything. I don't know what to expect.
translation.zh:
我什么也没期待
我不知道该期待什么

translation.en: I didn't expect to fall in love with you and I did!
translation.zh: 我没想爱上你 但是我爱你！

translation.en: And I know you've thought about it.
I look at you and I see it. I feel it. It's more than just sex to you too.
translation.zh:
我看着你 我看得出来
能感受到 这对你也不止是性

translation.en: I have two kids! I have a family. I can't.
translation.zh: 我有两个孩子！我有家庭 我不可以

translation.en: I want to have a family too.
ZOE: He changed the rules on me. He wasn't supposed to do that.
translation.zh:
他对我改变了规则
他不应该那样的

translation.en: But, I mean, Jason wasn't listening.
translation.zh: 但我想 杰森根本没听

translation.en: I could picture myself with him.
translation.zh: 我能想象他和我一起的画面

translation.en: How does that make you feel, Zoe?
Like I was cheating with my heart. Which is not what I signed on for.
translation.zh: 好像我在欺骗我的内心 这不是我签约的原因

translation.en: -This is not what I need. -MARCELLA: What do you need?
translation.zh:
-这不是我需要的
-那你需要什么？

translation.en: COREY: Oh, yeah? You want it?
ZOE: I've never done it like that before.
I enjoyed every minute of it.
You know, some kind of pill that you can prescribe?
Oh, Lord. I even sound like an addict.
translation.zh: 上帝 我听起来就像个瘾君子

translation.en: You know that we never really got a chance to talk about your childhood in Dallas,
translation.zh:
你知道我们从来没有机会
谈论你在达拉斯的童年
在你搬到亚特兰大之前

translation.en: Oh, I don't remember any of that.
translation.zh: 噢 那些我不记得了

translation.en: You were 10 years old when you moved, right?
translation.zh: 搬家的时候你十岁 是吗？

translation.en: I'm telling you, I don't remember anything.
translation.zh: 跟你说 我什么都不记得了

translation.en: He says it's because my life began when I met him.
translation.zh:
他说那是因为我的生活
是始于遇见他

translation.en: So when'd you get that scar?
translation.zh: 那你什么时候有那道伤疤？
是在亚特兰大之前的事吗？

translation.en: Uh... God, I've always had this. Why? What does it matter?
translation.zh:
上帝我受够了
为什么？这有什么关系吗？

translation.en: Because, Zoe, the past can help us understand the present.
translation.zh:
因为 佐伊
过去可以帮助我们了解现在

translation.en: So we really do need to explore every avenue,
translation.zh: 所以我们真的需要探索每一条路

translation.en: in order to help make you well.
Listen, I will try to remember more, for next week.
translation.zh:
听着我会努力记住更多
为了下一周

-你喜欢吗？
-噢 上帝 是的

translation.en: Oh, there's just something going around at the kids' school.
We need to go over the numbers for this quarter,
translation.zh: 我们得看下这个季度的业绩

translation.en: QUINTON: Little busy. Just leave it at the beep.
translation.zh: 有点忙 听到声音后请留言

translation.en: I see your car downstairs, but I don't see you.
translation.zh:
我看到你的车在楼下
但没看到你

translation.en: Can we talk it over, please?
Why don't you talk it over with your little trick over there, huh?
translation.zh: 为什么不留着和你的小狐狸精说？

translation.en: what's going on with you two.
I mean, you can stay and watch if you want.
translation.zh:
你可以留下来看
如果你想的话

translation.en: Zoe, I know it's fucked up, but please...
translation.zh: 佐伊我知道这有点乱 但请…

translation.en: This whole thing is fucked up!
This whole thing is fucked up!
Yeah, you know what? You're absolutely right!
'Cause you get to go to your husband every night.
translation.zh: 因为你每晚都去找你的老公

translation.en: And what? What do you expect me to do, Zoe?
translation.zh: 你还能希望我怎么做 佐伊？

translation.en: Just wait here for you? Is that what... Is that what you want me to do?
translation.zh:
在这儿等你？
那是你想我做的吗？

translation.en: Zoe, I'm talking to you! What do you want me to do?
translation.zh:
佐伊我在和你说呢！
你想要我怎样做？
来 佐伊 听着 佐伊

translation.en: Zoe, I asked you to be with me.
translation.zh: 佐伊 我问过你和我一起

translation.en: What do you want me to do?
Tell me. Whatever you want me to do, I'll do it.
translation.zh:
跟我说
无论你要我怎么做我都会照做

translation.en: What do you want? What the fuck did you want from me?
translation.zh:
你想要什么？
你他妈的到底想要什么？

translation.en: I don't want a damn thing.
I think I'm a little too old to be tucked in.
translation.zh:
我觉得我年纪太大了
不适合掖被子了
妈妈 我一会儿回来

translation.en: JASON: You've missed every single soccer game.
Kayla's asking where you go at night.
translation.zh: 凯拉一直在问你晚上去哪儿了

translation.en: I tried explaining to her, but I couldn't.
translation.zh:
我试着给她解释
但我不知道该怎么解释

translation.en: So maybe you can explain it to me.
Why? You're the only person allowed to work late?
translation.zh:
为什么？
就只有你可以工作到很晚吗？
我是工作 我不玩消失

translation.en: Do you how many nights that I've stayed up waiting up for you?
translation.zh:
你知道有多少夜晚
我为你等到天亮了吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'm in my office. I answer your calls.
translation.zh: 我在办公室 我回你电话的

translation.en: You always know where I am.
I don't know what you do at work. I don't know who you talk to.
translation.zh:
我不知道你在工作时做什么、
不知道你和谁讲话

translation.en: I don't know what you're doing with them.
translation.zh: 不知道你和他们在做什么

translation.en: I mean, I work too, Jason.
translation.zh: 我是说 我也有工作 杰森

translation.en: My work's not as important because I don't make as much money as you?
translation.zh:
我的工作就没你重要
因为没你挣得多？

translation.en: No, I think this is about us.
translation.zh: 不 我想是我们之间

translation.en: I think we should talk about what's missing.
translation.zh: 我想我们应该谈谈缺失了什么

translation.en: We got a beautiful home, beautiful kids, we got great careers.
translation.zh:
我们有漂亮的家、
漂亮的孩子、不错的事业

translation.en: What the hell else do you want?
Yeah, everything's perfect. Look, I want you.
translation.zh: 是啊 一切都很完美 但我想要你

translation.en: I mean, I want you to loosen up.
You know? If you just loosened up, and I could...
translation.zh:
你知道吗？如果你可以放松下
我可以…

translation.en: I could take us to places that is just...
I mean, you know, we could try new things...
translation.zh: 我想说我们可以尝试一些新的…

translation.en: -You know? -Okay, who the hell are you?
translation.zh:
-你知道吗？
-好吧 你到底是谁？

translation.en: My wife tells me when something is wrong.
translation.zh: 我妻子在不对的时候会告诉我

translation.en: tells me about her day, makes time for her family,
translation.zh:
跟我说她的一天
把时间留给家人

translation.en: and she doesn't get a fancy new cell phone
and then lie about it. And what is this?
Since when do you care if I see what's in your bag?
translation.zh:
你什么时候开始介意
我看你包里的东西了？

translation.en: Jason, I told you that I went to the doctor.
translation.zh:
杰森 我告诉过你
我去看医生了

translation.en: I wasn't feeling well, and so we...
translation.zh: 我不太舒服 所以我们…

translation.en: You know I would do anything for you, right?
translation.zh: 你知道我愿为你做任何事的是吧？

translation.en: I love you more than life itself.
You could do me right here.
Come on. The kids are asleep.
You don't get it, do you?
...Preston Ellis is going over to ARC.
translation.zh: 普雷斯顿埃利斯要去ARC了

translation.en: Ugh. Well, get him on the phone. I'll try and...
translation.zh:
呃 好吧
让他接电话我会…

translation.en: There's more. Both Kanisha Wylie and Rob Diaz are going with him.
translation.zh:
还不止 卡妮莎威利和罗卜迪亚兹
都和他一起走

translation.en: And I think that's a letter from Alfred Conteh's lawyer on your desk.
translation.zh:
我想那是一封来自
阿尔弗雷孔戴的律师信在你桌上

translation.en: He's suddenly decided he doesn't need representation.
translation.zh: 他突然决定 他不需要代理了

translation.en: Oh, well, forget him. He's an idiot.
translation.zh: 管他呢 他就是个白痴

translation.en: I have no life because I work my ass off 24/7,
translation.zh:
我没有生活
因为我一周七天全天工作

translation.en: to keep a company going for a boss
who hasn't given a shit about the business for months now.
translation.zh: 老板已经不管生意好几个月了

translation.en: And now I'm trying to figure out how I'm gonna make my rent.
translation.zh: 现在我在想怎样付我的租金

translation.en: who is also supposed to be my best friend,
translation.zh: 同时也是我最好的朋友

translation.en: can't even see that we might not make payroll next week.
translation.zh:
甚至都看不出我们下周的
工资可能发不出来

translation.en: You don't get to give up now.
You know, I came to work here because I believed in you.
translation.zh: 我来这里工作 是因为我相信你

translation.en: The girl who could... Who could spot talent
in a kid painting on the side of a building.
translation.zh: 孩子的画作中发现天赋

translation.en: If anyone can fix this, you can.
translation.zh:
如果有人可以挽救这一切的话
那就是你

translation.en: But you need to act. Do what you do best.
translation.zh: 但你需要行动 尽你最大的努力

translation.en: Bring in that big artist. Have that great idea.
translation.zh:
找来最大牌的艺术家
获得最好的创意

translation.en: You know, this is it, Zoe. Sink or swim. It is up to you.
translation.zh:
你知道 就是这样 佐伊
沈溺还是游泳都取决于你

translation.en: And I will do anything you need. But do not just disappear on me.
translation.zh:
我会做任何你需要的
但不要失踪

translation.en: I'm happy to have you back, whatever the reason is.
translation.zh:
很高兴你回来
不管是因为什么原因

translation.en: -Good to see ya. -Good to see you, too.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你
-也很高兴见到你

translation.en: Ed and Aaron are gonna meet us at the restaurant.
translation.zh: 艾德跟亚伦会和我们在餐厅见

translation.en: But I don't believe you've met our chief architect, Mr Jason Reynard.
translation.zh:
不敢相信
你已经见到了我们的总建筑师 -杰森雷纳德
-幸会

translation.en: QUINTON: Mr Jason. JASON: All right.
Since you'll be doing the mural,
I wanted Jason to see your work first-hand.
translation.zh: 我想让杰森亲眼看看你的作品

translation.en: -Yeah, no problem. Of course. -(MOBILE PHONE RINGING)
Excuse me, gentlemen, I have to take this.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我得接个电话

translation.en: You know, my wife, she would love your stuff.
translation.zh: 我妻子 她应该会喜欢你的作品

translation.en: Started her own agency from the ground up.
translation.zh: 白手起家开了自己的代理公司

translation.en: I'm gonna get you a card for her.
translation.zh: 我想要你的名片来拿给她

translation.en: She's got a great eye, and she's a marketing genius.
translation.zh: 她眼光独到 是个营销天才

translation.en: I'm sure she could make you a mint in reproductions.
translation.zh:
我相信她能通过复制品
给你创造不菲收益

translation.en: We should get goin'. Our reservations are for 6:30.
translation.zh: 我们该走了 预订是六点半的

translation.en: BENNY: Let's go celebrate and have some drinks.
translation.zh: 让我好好庆祝一下 喝一杯

translation.en: I gotta handle something real quick.
translation.zh: 我得尽快处理一些事情

translation.en: Meet you guys in a few.
You weren't gonna stop him, were you?
Have a dinner with a client.
PETER: I'm ready to go. Come on. KAYLA: Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
PETER: I don't wanna miss the previews, guys.
Jesus, Kayla, okay, look, you know,
translation.zh: 上帝 凯拉 好 看

translation.en: the movies are gonna start with or without us, guys.
translation.zh: 电影有我们或没有我们都会开始的

translation.en: Hey, where are you guys goin'?
-Some new Disney thing at Phipps. -We didn't think you'd wanna come.
translation.zh:
-去菲普斯看新的迪斯尼电影
-我们没想到你会来

translation.en: -I wanna come. -You can have my ticket.
You better hurry, the movie starts in 15 minutes.
translation.zh:
你最好快点
电影十五分钟后开始

translation.en: Oh, great. Now we're gonna miss the movie because of you.
translation.zh: 好了 现在要因为你错过电影了

translation.en: -I don't wanna miss the movie! -We're not gonna miss the movie!
translation.zh:
-我不想错过电影！
-我们不会错过电影的！

translation.en: Just put your shoe on, Kayla. Come on.
translation.zh: 凯拉穿上你的鞋 快点

translation.en: No, it's fine. You guys go ahead.
translation.zh: 不 没事 你们先走

translation.en: Have fun. I'll make cookies for when you get back.
translation.zh:
玩得愉快
你们回来后我会准备饼干

translation.en: See you in a couple hours.
PETER: Hey, Kayla, you know I'm in the front, right?
translation.zh: 凯拉 你知道我在前面的 对吧？
无论什么 不管怎样

translation.en: MARCELLA: So, how did that make you feel, being left alone?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎样 被独自留下？
就好像我失去了我的家

translation.en: Zoe, we need to talk about your childhood.
translation.zh: 佐伊 我们需要谈谈你的童年
你知道吗 斯宾塞医生？

translation.en: This is not working for me.
What is it about your past that scares you so much?
translation.zh: 你过去有什么让你如此害怕？

translation.en: ZOE: See, there you go again.
All the same questions. No answers.
translation.zh: 都是同样的问题 没有答案

translation.en: You just sit there, 100 bucks an hour,
translation.zh:
你就坐在这里
每小时要价100美元

translation.en: and all you do is ask the same stupid questions!
translation.zh: 你所做的就是问同样的愚蠢问题！

translation.en: It's okay for you to be frustrated.
But you have got to take control over your life now,
translation.zh: 但你要掌控好你现在的生活

translation.en: You need to confront your lovers, call it quits and go cold turkey.
translation.zh:
你要向情人们坦白
就此了结冷静下来

translation.en: And then you can begin to claim your life back.
translation.zh: 然后你才可以重新开始

translation.en: It may sound like a lot,
but I promise you it will be okay.
It's not okay! None of this is okay!
translation.zh: 不好！没有哪一样是好的！

translation.en: You know what? Jason was right.
People need to handle their own damn problems.
translation.zh: 人们需要处理他们自己的麻烦问题

translation.en: Paying you to listen to me is not the solution.
translation.zh: 付钱给你听 不是解决办法

translation.en: I need to sort this out on my own. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我要自己找出来 谢谢

translation.en: Zoe, you can't keep running from your past.
translation.zh: 佐伊 你不能一直逃避过去

translation.en: Because sooner or later, it's gonna catch up with you.
COREY: Have a good day. NINA: You too.
NINA: Slow down, honey. You're gonna give yourself a heart attack.
translation.zh:
慢点 亲爱的
你要心脏病发了

translation.en: Momma! What did that man want?
He was a messenger. You have a package.
translation.zh: 他是个快递员 你有个包裹

translation.en: NINA: What is it, honey? What's the matter?
(SIGHING) It's fine. Are the kids inside?
translation.zh: 没事 孩子们在里面吗？

translation.en: Of course. They're upstairs doin' their homework.
translation.zh: 当然啊 他们在楼上写作业呢

translation.en: Do you wanna talk to me about somethin'?
What's that? It's from Quinton Canosa.
He's doing the mural for the Civic Centre.
I went to his place, saw this, told him I loved it.
translation.zh:
我去过他工作室看到这个
跟他说我喜欢

translation.en: He sent it over as a gift. And a note.
translation.zh:
他就作为礼物送来了
还带着便签

translation.en: Here. "You told me your wife loves art, and I hope she enjoys this as well."
translation.zh:
这里 “你跟我说你妻子喜欢艺术
我希望她能喜欢这个”

translation.en: Can I even accept somethin' like this?
You know, I had bad sushi. (COUGHING)
It's gotta be worth a mint.
Maybe a... Maybe a wine for the lady?
Tell me what makes you happy. Tell me what makes you smile.
translation.zh:
跟我说什么让你开心
跟我说什么让你笑

translation.en: Tell me. Come on. What do you want?
translation.zh: 告诉我 拜托 你想要什么？

translation.en: I can't see you any more, Quinton.
translation.zh: 昆顿 我不能再见你了

translation.en: You can't see me any more? (CHUCKLING)

translation.zh: 佐伊 别这样 佐伊

translation.en: (SIGHING) If it's because of my gift, I was just fucking around, all right?
translation.zh:
如果是因为我送的礼物
我只是在胡闹好吧？

translation.en: I was just playin' around. I was just...
translation.zh: 我只是觉得好玩 我只是…

translation.en: No, it's not because of the stupid statue.
translation.zh: 不 不是因为那愚蠢的雕像

translation.en: Then what is it? What is it? Tell me, what is it?
translation.zh:
那是因为什么？是什么？
跟我说是为什么？

translation.en: Oh, my God. Come here. Please come here.
translation.zh: 我的天 过来 拜托过来

translation.en: Please don't make this any harder than it has to be. Okay?
translation.zh: 请不要让这件事变得更难好吗？

translation.en: Quinton, I need you to hear me.
I am listening to you. I am listening to you. Okay?
translation.zh: 我在听 我在听 好吗？

translation.en: Who the fuck am I? Who the fuck are you?
translation.zh:
我他妈的是谁？
你才他妈的是谁？

translation.en: I got an urgent text from her to come here.
translation.zh: 我接到她的紧急短信要我来

translation.en: I only wanna do this once.
Wait. You fuckin' this guy, too?
translation.zh: 等等 你也在和这个人做是吗？

translation.en: It seems Miss Zoe has been cheating not only on her husband,
translation.zh:
看上去似乎佐伊小姐
不只是背叛她的丈夫

translation.en: You brought me all the way down here to confess?
translation.zh: 你把我带到这里来坦白吗？

translation.en: I mean, I don't know. Maybe we can form a...
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许我们可以从…

translation.en: We can form a support group, some shit like that, huh?
translation.zh:
我们可以建一个互助小组
这样的吗？

translation.en: Look, I got you both here at the same time to tell you that it's over.
translation.zh:
我把你们同时带到这里来
告诉你们都结束了

translation.en: This has got to stop, okay?
translation.zh: 这一切需要结束 好吗？

translation.en: I love my husband, I love my children, and I don't wanna see you again.
translation.zh:
我爱我的丈夫 我爱我的孩子们
我不想再见你们了

translation.en: So you think this is okay?
You can fuck anybody you want and then it's just, what, it's goodbye?
translation.zh:
你可以想上谁就上了
然后就这样拍拍屁股走人了？

translation.en: Don't you get it? I can't control myself.
translation.zh:
你们还不明白吗？
我控制不了我自己

translation.en: It doesn't matter who I screw. I'm sick.
translation.zh: 和谁搞都无关紧要 我生病了

translation.en: Look, I got no beef with you, man.
translation.zh: 听着老兄我对你没有不满
你想知道些事吗 佐伊？

translation.en: You know, since I was a little boy, people would just walk away from me.
translation.zh:
我还是小孩子的时候
人们就离开我

translation.en: Just walk out of my life.
You're not gonna walk away from me. You're not gonna leave me.
translation.zh: 你不要离开我 你不能离开我

translation.en: Oh, you're scared of me now?
What, my touch isn't good enough for you now?
translation.zh: 我的触摸对你还不够好吗？

translation.en: Tell me! I'm fucking asking you something!
translation.zh: 跟我说！我他妈的在问你呢！

translation.en: Look, let's just talk about it, okay?
We're not gonna talk about shit any more, you fucking little bitch.
translation.zh: 我们不用再说什么了 你这小贱货

translation.en: We're not gonna talk about anything.
translation.zh: 我们什么也不用再谈了

translation.en: Very fuckin' painful, you fuckin' bitch.
translation.zh: 他妈的非常痛 你他妈的贱人

translation.en: Come over here, you fuckin' bitch!
You know, all I ever wanted to do,
translation.zh: 你知道的 我想要的就只是

translation.en: was to have some good sex with you.
What you lookin' at? Don't look at me like that.
translation.zh: 你在看什么？不要那样看我

translation.en: I told you to leave your fuckin' husband, but you wouldn't listen to me.
translation.zh:
叫你离开你那该死的老公
可你就是不听

translation.en: Because you're a little selfish bitch.
translation.zh: 因为你是个自私的小贱人

translation.en: You know that I would never hurt you like you hurt me.
translation.zh:
你知道我绝不会
像你伤害我那样伤害你

translation.en: I would never do that to you. I would never do that to you!
translation.zh:
我绝不会那样对你
我绝不会那样对你的！

translation.en: Look at you. Look at you, you're so fucking beautiful.
translation.zh: 看看你 你他妈的这样美！

translation.en: I'm gonna make sure your last thoughts are of me.
(STAMMERING) Look at me. Look at me. Look at me.

translation.zh: 你可以把这个拿回去了

translation.en: You left this on the kitchen table.
translation.zh: 你把这个放在厨房桌子上

translation.en: Told me all I need to know.
Jason, please. Please hear me out.
translation.zh: 杰森求你了 听我说

translation.en: I don't need to hear a goddamn thing.
Got a pretty clear picture here.
translation.zh: 这里的情形十分明白了

translation.en: Look, I know that I lied.
But I'm not lying to you right now when I say that I've been seeing a doctor.
translation.zh: 但我说我在见医生 这没骗你

translation.en: And she's been helping me with my condition.
translation.zh: 她一直在帮我解决我的问题

translation.en: That's the technical term for "screwing around on your husband"?
translation.zh:
这是“背着丈夫鬼混”的
专业术语吗？

translation.en: I know I fucked up. I know I did. But I love you and you love me!
translation.zh:
我知道我搞砸了
但我爱你 你也爱我！

translation.en: -And I think we can work it out. -Yeah, let's all have therapy!
translation.zh:
-我想我们可以解决的
-让我们都进行治疗吧！

translation.en: Look, you can't just throw away everything we...
translation.zh: 你不能把这一切都抛掉…

translation.en: You put our kids in danger!
translation.zh: 你让孩子们处于危险的境地！

translation.en: You are a lying, cheating whore.
translation.zh: 你是个撒谎骗人的婊子

translation.en: And you won't be gettin' the kids.
You're dead to me. You hear me?
translation.zh: 对于我而言你已经死了！听到了吗？

translation.en: -I can't believe we came to this. -Me neither.
translation.zh:
-不敢相信会到这一步
-我也没想到

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't think I can do this.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我想我不可以这样

translation.en: All those people you were with...
translation.zh: 所有那些和你一起的人…

translation.en: When I look at you, that's all I can see.
translation.zh: 当我看到你的时候 就会看到他们
（妈妈欢迎回家 我们想你！）

translation.en: Is it okay to hug you? I don't wanna break you.
translation.zh: 可以抱你吗？我不想弄疼你

translation.en: Oh, break my heart is more like it.
I love you, Mom. I love you more.
-(DOOR OPENING) -NINA: Hi, Brina. She's in there, watching TV.
translation.zh: 嗨 布琳娜 她在那儿 在看电视

translation.en: What is this? You don't even like television.
translation.zh: 这是什么？你根本不喜欢电视

translation.en: What the hell are you doing, Zoe?
translation.zh: 你到底在干什么 佐伊？

translation.en: You've been sitting in this house for months now.
translation.zh: 你这样坐在房子里好几个月了

translation.en: The pity party officially ends today.
translation.zh: 遗憾派对今天正式结束

translation.en: You need to get up, and get your behind back to work.
translation.zh: 你需要起来 挥别过去开始工作

translation.en: This ain't fair to you or those beautiful kids of yours.
translation.zh:
这样对你和你那些
漂亮的孩子们都不公平

translation.en: I'm not... I'm not ready to go anywhere yet.
translation.zh: 我还没准备好去其他地方

translation.en: Dr Spencer called this morning again.
translation.zh: 斯宾塞医生今早又打电话来了

translation.en: Says you're not taking her call.
She asked that I make sure you get this.
translation.zh: 她要我确保你拿到这个

translation.en: You know what, Zoe? You can try to chase me away,
translation.zh:
你知道吗 佐伊？
你可以试图赶我走

translation.en: Brina, I appreciate what you're trying to do, okay?
translation.zh:
布琳娜 我很感谢你做的
知道吗？

布琳娜 我很感谢你做的
知道吗？ 我真的感激

translation.en: You did not just turn that television back on while I was talking to you!
translation.zh:
我跟你说的时候
你不能把电视再打开！

translation.en: If that's how it's gonna be, then...
MAN ON TV: ...and you're going to have to make 250 portions.
WOMAN ON TV: And then you think you're a chef, right?
translation.zh: 你觉得你是主厨 是吗？

translation.en: -(BOTH LAUGH ON TV) -MAN: Well, I do hope so.
Can I get a hug? Hello?
-BOTH: Bye, Dad. -What do we do first?
translation.zh:
-拜拜 爸爸
-我们先做什么？

translation.en: BOTH: Wash our hands and do our homework.
You know, the kids think we go to the hotel to let Mommy rest.
translation.zh:
孩子们以为我们去酒店
是为了让妈妈好好休息

translation.en: I don't know how to tell them that we're apart.
translation.zh:
我不知道怎样告诉他们
我们分开了

translation.en: She messed up. But she needs you now, more than ever.
translation.zh:
她搞砸了 但她现在需要你
比任何时候都更需要

translation.en: And if I can forgive her, so can you.
translation.zh:
如果我可以原谅她
那你也可以

translation.en: "In sickness and in health." Those weren't just words, were they?
translation.zh:
“无论健康还是疾病”
这些不仅仅是说说而已 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, what about honesty and faithfulness?
Well, I have trouble understanding that.
You two built this house and this family together.
translation.zh: 你们俩共同建造了这屋子和家庭

translation.en: And just because it doesn't fit into a perfect package,
translation.zh: 只是因为放不进一个完美的包装袋

translation.en: are you willing to throw all that away?
translation.zh: 你就愿意把一切都丢掉吗？

translation.en: Looks like we have a new member.
translation.zh: 看起来我们来了一个新伙伴

translation.en: Would you like to stand up and introduce yourself?
translation.zh: 可以站起来介绍一下自己吗？

translation.en: And I am a sex addict.
When I was 10 years old, I was raped by three boys.
translation.zh: 我十岁的时候被三个男孩强奸了

translation.en: Uh, I buried that memory far, far away until...
translation.zh: 我把这段记忆深深地埋葬了

translation.en: reminded me exactly why I had to remember.
translation.zh: 提醒了我为什么要记起来

translation.en: I, uh, would lie and cheat and do whatever I could to get that fix.
translation.zh:
我会撒谎、会欺骗
做尽一切来弥补

translation.en: (SOBBING) I know it's hard for him to believe that,
translation.zh: 我知道他很难相信这一切

translation.en: I miss my best friend, and I know that
with help from the one person that I hurt the most...
translation.zh:
我知道从我伤害最深的那个人
那里获得帮助
